posts.post_title: St Louis Cardinals T3, T201, T204 FS
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Aaron Cowan
I have a few cards up for sale.  Here is the website (at bottom) where you can find scans:

Ed Konetchy T3 - $375 **SOLD**
Lush/Hauser T201 - $50
Ed Konetchy T204 - $90  **SOLD**
Huggins/Bresnahan T201 - $225

Prices are negotiable.  Selling is preferred although a trade for other St Louis Cardinals cards/memorabilia may be considered.  Email (acowan19@gmail.com) takes priority over response to this thread and I will reply emails/repsonses in the order they come.

Thanks

Aaron Cowan - acowan19@gmail.com
